question: Do the following two Salaat originate from valid Ahadith?Tahayyatul Wudu, Tahayyatul Masjid, I probably mis-transliterated the term Tahtul.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
1. It is stated in a Hadith that the performance of 2 Rakaats (Tahiyyatul
Wudhu) after performing Wudhu, entitles one entry into Jannah. (Muslim)
2. Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'When anyone of you enters
the Musjid, he should not sit until he has offered 2 Rakaats (Nafl).'
(Bukhari)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
